sentences.english: Wheat field is full of fragrance overflowing to wheat straw.
sentences.chinese: 麥場上到處是清香四溢地麥秸。

sentences.english: It is possible to make many kinds of wheat straw panel with the wheat straw as main material.
sentences.chinese: 用麥秸爲主要原料製造多類麥秸人造板是可行的。

sentences.english: It is possible to make many kinds of wheat straw panel with the wheat straw as main material.
sentences.chinese: 用麥秸爲主要原料製造多類麥秸人造板是可行的。

sentences.english: Effects of straw and residue mulching on microclimate of summer corn field.
sentences.chinese: 麥秸和殘茬覆蓋對夏玉米農田小氣候的影響。

sentences.english: We spread ourselves on wheat straw on the farm when we were tired.
sentences.chinese: 我們累了就伸開四肢仰臥在農場的麥秸上。

sentences.english: Wheat straw painting, crafts painting class.
